content.text: Attempt blocked. Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Riyad Mahrez.
Foul by Oriol Romeu (Southampton).
Foul by Marc Albrighton (Leicester City).
Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Leicester City. Demarai Gray tries a through ball, but Jamie Vardy is caught offside.
Foul by Ben Chilwell (Leicester City).
Second Half begins Leicester City 0, Southampton 0.
Ryan Bertrand (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jamie Vardy (Leicester City).
Attempt blocked. Adrien Silva (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ben Chilwell.
Attempt missed. Dusan Tadic (Southampton) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Attempt missed. Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left.
Attempt blocked. Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Riyad Mahrez.
Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by James Ward-Prowse (Southampton).
Demarai Gray (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jamie Vardy.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Jan Bednarek.
Foul by Marc Albrighton (Leicester City).
Dusan Tadic (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
